divs: Sighting Details1.was at friends home lookingat the stars.2.the brightness of the ship.3.a ufo!4.it moved slow south to north saucer shape with spinning top dome shiney bright silver with high preasure steaming noise.5.i was in total awe!and very excited.6.it moved in same direction behind hill just 100 yards from my cabin. P.S. i will send a sketch to you.
Summary: I was looking west ,just a half a mile away ,150 feet above the ground..between two hills hovering over the Matole river swim holebrightly silver saucer ,top was spinning with dark windows,white steam,no noise.400 feet in diam..it was looking at me+i at i
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Fortuna
There were no other sightings in Fortuna on or around September 15th 1994
